item.title: 30 Lies Puppetlabs Made About Ansible, #25 Will Shock You
item.description:
Disclaimer: While I was once an employee of Red Hat and Ansible. I am not employed by Red Hat anymore and this blog post was not sanctioned or endorsed by Red Hat in any way. On June 26th, 2018, PuppetLabs via their Twitter account made the following tweet
If you rather not go through their form-wall you can get it directly here https://puppet.com/system/files/2018-06/puppet-wp-compare-puppet-and-ansible.pdf This tweet sparked my interest.
